text: ءَآلۡـَٰٔنَ وَقَدۡ عَصَيۡتَ قَبۡلُ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

translation.en: Now? And you had disobeyed [Him] before and were of the corrupters
translation.id: Mengapa baru sekarang (kamu beriman), padahal sesungguhnya engkau telah durhaka sejak dahulu, dan engkau termasuk orang yang berbuat kerusakan
